sections.heading: Civil
sections.text:
liability of innkeepers for theft, loss, damage or destruction of property

brought by patron on premises or left in motor vehicle upon premises.

sections.heading: Civil
sections.text:
liability of innkeepers for theft, loss, damage or destruction of certain motor

vehicles.

sections.heading: Civil
sections.text:
liability of innkeepers for death or injury of person on premises caused by

person who is not employee under control or supervision of innkeeper.

sections.heading: Certain
Certain
sections.text:
rates must be included on printed statement of charges or rates; registration

card must be maintained; receipt must be given; charges must not exceed rates

on printed statement; liability for violations; criminal penalty.

sections.heading: Inapplicability
sections.text:
to private clubs, private online discussion forums and other establishments not

open to public; exception.

sections.heading: Not
sections.text:
unlawful or ground for civil action for place of public accommodation to offer

differential pricing, discounted pricing or special offers based on sex.

sections.heading: All
sections.text: persons entitled to equal enjoyment of places of public accommodation.

sections.heading: Single-stall
sections.text:
restrooms provided to public: Requirement to make inclusive and accessible;

labeling; no private right of action against owner or operator established or

filing of complaint with Nevada Equal Rights Commission authorized for

violation.

sections.heading: Rights,
sections.text:
duties and liabilities of persons training or accompanied by service animal,

service animal in training or police dog; unlawful acts; rights of place of

accommodation; unmuzzled service animal may not be presumed dangerous;

exception for miniature horse under certain circumstances; person subject to

same conditions and limitations as others; remedies.

sections.heading: Deprivation
sections.text:
of, interference with and punishment for exercising rights, privileges or

access: Prohibition; penalty; limitation.

sections.heading: Deprivation
sections.text:
of, interference with and punishment for exercising rights and privileges:

Civil actions; damages; equitable relief; costs and attorney�s fees.

sections.heading: County
sections.text:
and city ordinances prohibiting infringement of rights, privileges or access:

Authority to adopt; limitations.

sections.heading: Filing
sections.text: of complaint with Nevada Equal Rights Commission; exception.
